column5: I wish you all Merry Christmas~! Happy New Year~! Wonderful Holidays~! Countless Wonderful Fishing Trips in the up coming 2007~!  As for me, I'm heading to San Francisco tomorrow... My uncle has already booked a boat for some San Francisco Bay fishing (but the weather doesn't look so good, therefore it might be cancelled... finger crossing)
Merry Christmas as well. Have a good trip.
merry christmas   steelcat,and hey a little rain and wind,never stop us die-hards go get them,tell those guys how us OFC's  guys catch fish      good luck
Merry Christmas to you and A Happy New Year. Enjoy your trip south.
...and a very Happy Holiday to you too !
